ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yall are starting to sound like my guild :) Now stop it :P Halana/Tani the conflict avoider Paradigm Solusek Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Yall are starting to sound like my guild :)
Now stop it :P

Halana/Tani the conflict avoider
Paradigm
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 12:17 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
>
>
> Just as nonsensical as saying a lvl 3 bard with a DE mask
> makes a lvl 24
> song useless.
>
> Rokenn the crappy bard
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 11:07 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
>
>
> That comment was nonsensical Rokenn. You can't sing Concord till 24th
> anyhow.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 12:00 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
>
>
> Oh and BTW Draelon the DE mask does not work till 14th level,
> so your lvl 3
> bard twink friend can't use it anyway.
>
> Just another crappy bard,
> Rokenn
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@k...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 10:14 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@y...'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
> >
> >
> > ANY bard that is wasting a song slot to sing this should be booted.
> Get a
> > cold stone, get a DE mask (I know level 3 bards with this), get a
> glowing
> > stone band, get a caster to cast ultra vision on you. WHATEVER.
> This song is
> > useless, and to try to justify it by saying that there are a few
> select uses
> > for it is being argumentative.
> >
> > This song rates up there with Denon's Desperate Dirge, Melody of
> Ervaj and
> > Solon's Charismatic Concord.
> >
> > Draelon Stormsong
> > Troubador of Karana
> > Tribunal Server
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@r...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 1:20 PM
> > To: eqbards@y...
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
> >
> >
> > At 12:59 PM 2/27/01 -0500, you wrote:
> > >i have never used concord once. never. it is useless.
> >
> > that would have been a correct statement if you had added ''to me''
> at the
> > end of ''it is useless''. if you were a human bard without a dark
> elf mask,
> > i believe you would find it very useful.
> >
